page.title: 13Churches
page.content: There are several churches of various denominations in the squares ref. 5030 and 4931.They are St.Peter & St. Paul, St.Bernards, St. Barnabas, and Holy Family, all Roman Catholic. St. Andrews, St.Davids, St.Margarets and St. Christophers which are all Church of England and Lea Methodist. Most of these are involved in more than just the worship of God. Most support organisation such as the Church Lads and Church Girls Brigade, Brownies,Girl Guides, Scouts and Mothers' Union. Of church going families most attend the local church although a fair proportion, approximately 15 per cent, go to worship outside the area retaining links with their original parish (e.g. in Preston) before moving to live in Lea/ Ashton area.
